attributes.action: Pay for veterans funeral across the Uk
attributes.additional_details:
Just take a look at my website and the signed letter from David Cameron stating these heroes are a burden on the tax payers.
www.angelsandheroes.fund
attributes.background: Far to many veterans make a final journey as a pauper let's put a full stop to it now by insisting anyone who has served this Country gets the government to pay for the funeral not just those who die with no family
